title: Bug 42225 - Unable to assign command to Ctrl+Backspace
description: Bug 42225 - Unable to assign command to Ctrl+Backspace
OB: Currently, it is not possible to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace in the system.
EB: Ctrl+Backspace should be assignable to a command. In the default configuration, pressing Ctrl+Backspace should delete the previous word.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the system settings or preferences. 2. Navigate to the keyboard shortcuts or key bindings section. 3. Attempt to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace. 4. Notice that it is not possible to assign the command to this key combination.
